Uses of Class
states.GameStateManager

Packages that use GameStateManager
Package Description
GUI  
screens  

  • Uses of GameStateManager in GUI

    Constructors in GUI with parameters of type GameStateManager
    Constructor Description
    MainmenuButton​(int posX, int posY, GameStateManager gsm)
    Create a MainmenuButton to the given position to be able to go back to the main menu
    PlayAgainButton​(int posX, int posY, GameStateManager gsm)
    Create a PlayAgainButton to the given position to Restart the game
    PlayButton​(java.lang.String path, int posX, int posY, GameStateManager gsm)
    Create a PlayButton to the given position to Start the game

  • Uses of GameStateManager in screens

    Constructors in screens with parameters of type GameStateManager
    Constructor Description
    GameOver​(GameStateManager gsm)
    Display GameOver Screen with the width and height as the width and height of the device Display the last score the player got Set the state to GAMEOVER
    Level1​(GameStateManager gsm)
    Start the game and display the Level1 Screen with a 0 player score
    Menu​(GameStateManager gsm)
    Display MainMenu Screen with the width and height as the width and height of the device With a PlayButton and ExitButton
